word: It was time to see how much we knew about arithmetic.
meaning: 우리가 산수에 대해 얼마나 알고 있는지 볼 시간이었다.

word: How many apples would you have left?
She counted the crayons from one to sixteen.
Miss Daisy still had a look on her face like she didn’t understand.
meaning: 데이지 선생님은 여전히 이해하지 못한 듯한 표정을 지었다.

word: No matter how many times we tried to explain
He had no hair at all!
Did all your hair fall out of your head?
That’s the saddest story I ever heard!
meaning: 그것은 내가 들은 가장 슬픈 이야기야!
